resources.string: Wifi Hotspot
Turn hotspot on and off. Check if hotspot is enabled. \nThe hotspot must be preconfigured in the system settings.
Mobile Data
Manage mobile data (internet connection). Check if mobile data is enabled.
Battery
Get level of the devices battery and check if it is loading.
Location
Get location of this device.
Wifi
Turn wifi on and off. Check if wifi is enabled.
Bluetooth
Turn bluetooth on and off. Check if bluetooth is enabled.
Audio
Manage volume of ringtone, music and more.

audio types:

ring, music, alarm, notification, system, phonecall, dtmf


volume:

index (e.g. 6), percentage (e.g. 90%), vibrate or silent (only for audio type ring)
Grant Phone Remotely

Grant a phone number access remotely. The phone number sending the grant command will be added to the list of granted phones for the specified module (or all modules when using the "all" keyword). If access is no longer necessary afterwards, you can remove the phone number from the list of granted phones in the relevant module(s).

module name:

The name of the module which you want the phone sending the command to be allowed to access.


Spaces are not allowed. Dashes (-), and underscores (_) are ignored.


To for example allow access to the WiFi Hotspot module, you can use any of the names "WiFi-Hotspot", "wifihotspot" or "wifi_hotspot".



password:

Any word or phrase to authenticate.


Can be chosen below and can contain latin letters (lower and capital), numbers, dashes and underscores.
Audio Recording

Record audio with axet's audio recorder app. 
Requires com.github.axet.audiorecorder app. 
 
The app can be downloaded from Google Play or F-Droid. https://f-droid.org/packages/com.github.axet.audiorecorder
Display
Manage the display\'s brightness and state (on or off). Set time, after which the display is turned off when the user is not interacting with the phone.

brightness:

percentage (e.g. 50%) or auto


timeout:

time, after which the display is turned off (e.g. 30min, 10.5s, 500ms)
Camera
Take picture with predefined or individual settings.

settings:

individual settings for this capture


options:

A combination of:

- front cam, back cam, cam [index]

- flash on, flash off, flash auto
Play Sound
Play ringtone for a specific duration (10s by default).

duration:

Time, for which the ringtone should be played (e.g. 30min, 10.5s, 500ms). The default duration is 10s.
